headline.main: CHUTE FAILS TO WORK AS FLIER BAILS OUT; U.S. Crewman Kicks It Open, Spends 54 Hours in Sea

lead_paragraph: ALLIED HEADQUARTERS IN NORTH AFRICA, Aug. 31 (U.P.) -- When Bombardier Peter M. Robeck of Los Angeles bailed out of his blasted and burning Flying Fortress over the Mediterranean and pulled the rip-cord his heart froze.
abstract: Describes experiences after bailing out from burning plane into Mediterranean Sea
snippet: ALLIED HEADQUARTERS IN NORTH AFRICA, Aug. 31 (U.P.) -- When Bombardier Peter M. Robeck of Los Angeles bailed out of his blasted and burning Flying Fortress over the Mediterranean and pulled the rip-cord his heart froze....
